messages.title: FRESH VISION
messages.content: For the challenges we face LOCALLY NATIONALLY GLOBALLY Lichfield & Burntwood needs an MP like PAUL RAY Committed to making our country FAIRER, GREENER, BETTER place

messages.title: 10 MORE YEARS OF BREXIT
messages.content: Johnson's plan: will not resolve our future EU relationship - or the Tory civil war over Europe. But it will mean a hard exit from trade blocks, making port delays worse for shoppers and farmers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes a hard Brexit and advocates for stopping Brexit, suggests that the Liberal Democrats are the only party committed to revoking Article 50 and stopping Brexit.

mentions.candidate: Local Councillor Paul Ray has been chosen by Liberal Democrats to champion Lichfield & Burntwood as their Parliamentary candidate in this election.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Corbyn has always wanted Brexit and was willing to work with the conservatives to get it. Labour now say they want two referendums because they're undecided.

issues.brexitEurope: 10 MORE YEARS OF BREXIT - Johnson's plan will not resolve our future EU relationship - or the Tory civil war over Europe. But it will mean a hard exit from trade blocks, making port delays worse for shoppers and farmers.
issues.socialWelfare: Paul has been working wide-spread... including public nuisance, housing issues.

housing.content: Paul has been working wide-spread... issues affecting Lichfield and Burntwood.

leaflet.personalStatement: Paul Ray: A STRONG VOICE FOR US

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked on issues affecting Lichfield city and the parishes in Burntwood. Re-elected in 2019.

images.caption: Paul Ray: A STRONG VOICE FOR US
